snippet.title: George Russell Influenced Future of Jazz
snippet.description:
George Russell Influenced Future of Jazz
28 Jul 2009 by variety.spice.life on VARIETY . SPICE . LIFE artandhistory.wordpress.com/2009/07/28/george-russell-influenced-future-of-jazz/
BOSTON (AP) — Jazz composer George Russell, a MacArthur fellow whose theories influenced the modal music of Miles Davis and John Coltrane, has died. His publicist says Russell, who taught at the New England Conservatory, died Monday in Boston at age 86 …
Topics: George Russell

snippet.title: (May 5, 2013): George Russell Sextet – Ezz-Thetics
snippet.description:
(May 5, 2013): George Russell Sextet – Ezz-Thetics
4 May 2013 by danton1066 on Once Was A Note oncewasanote.com/2013/05/05/may-5-2013-george-russell-sextet-ezz-thetic/
From the 1961 album, Ezz-Thetics. More a composer and theorist than player, George Russell is captured here on piano with some cutting-edge talent. Russell received a MacArthur "Genius" Award in 1989 for his contributions to music and this …
Topics: jazz, George Russell Sextet
